statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT id, product_name, amount FROM sales_data WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name, category
SELECT id, amount FROM sales_data WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE amount > 1000 AND product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY category HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT product_name, date FROM sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM sales_data GROUP BY category HAVING total_entries >= 3 ORDER BY total_entries DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, predicted_amount FROM forecast_data ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING average_sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY average_sale_amount DESC;

SELECT s.product_id, s.sale_date, f.forecast_date, f.predicted_amount FROM sales_data s INNER JOIN forecast_data f ON s.product_id = f.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > f.predicted_amount ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.product_id, s.sale_date, f.forecast_date, f.predicted_amount FROM forecast_data f LEFT JOIN sales_data s ON f.product_id = s.product_id ORDER BY f.predicted_amount DESC, s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, trend_date, trend_description FROM sales_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, forecast_date, predicted_sale_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT id, trend_date, trend_description FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT forecast_date, AVG(predicted_sale_amount) AS avg_forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY forecast_date HAVING avg(predicted_sale_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM sales_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT timestamp, predicted_sales_amount FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY forecast_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_result FROM business_insights ORDER BY insight_id DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, timestamp, product_id, predicted_sales_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT insight_id, timestamp, analysis_result FROM business_insights ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sd.product_id, pc.product_name, sd.quantity_sold, pc.price FROM sales_data sd LEFT JOIN product_catalog pc ON sd.product_id = pc.product_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales;
SELECT sale_date, product_id, sales_amount FROM historical_sales WHERE sale_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM product_details ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT decision_date, decision_description FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT forecast_date, product_id, forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM historical_sales JOIN product_details ON historical_sales.product_id = product_details.product_id WHERE brand = 'ABC' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT decision_description FROM business_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND CHAR_LENGTH(decision_description) > 50 ORDER BY decision_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT product_name, forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast JOIN product_details ON sales_forecast.product_id = product_details.product_id WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND forecast_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_description, trend_date FROM sales_trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
